meanings.sent1: She wore a flauntier dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The peacock's feathers were even flauntier than before.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt flauntier than the dog in its new collar.
meanings.sent4: The sunsets in Hawaii are like a flauntier version of the ones back home.
meanings.sent5: The garden looked flauntier after the flowers bloomed.

meanings.sent1: His hat was even flauntier than hers.
meanings.sent2: The decorations at the party were getting flauntier by the minute.
meanings.sent3: The peacock thought it was getting even flauntier with each strut.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night was a flauntier sight than during the day.
meanings.sent5: The music became even flauntier as the band played on.
